name: Fairyland: The Guild
description: Hire mercenaries, buy potions, scrolls, and equipment to collect as many coins as possible in the Caves of Elements and get the highest rank.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
